data.title: Juliann Grant - Vice President Of Global Marketing at Razorleaf Corporation
data.meta_description: Juliann Grant has a diverse work experience in various marketing roles.
data.text:
Juliann Grant has a diverse work experience in various marketing roles. Juliann currently serves as the Vice President of Marketing at Razorleaf Corporation, where they direct the marketing strategy for both Razorleaf and Adaptive Corporation. Prior to this, they founded Sentrepity Marketing and worked as the President, focusing on helping SMB companies grow by tackling marketing challenges. Juliann has also held positions as the Vice President of Marketing at eCoast and Telesian Technology. Additionally, Juliann has served as a Board Member for Foster Kids of the Merrimack Valley and held roles at ISA, Lodestar Corporation (acquired by Oracle), Kronos Inc., InStream Corporation, and Pivotpoint Inc. (Spectrum Associates). Throughout their career, they have demonstrated expertise in product marketing, marketing communications, and brand strategy.

Juliann Grant attended Merrimack College from 1990 to 1997, where they obtained a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration with a focus on Marketing. Prior to their college studies, they completed their secondary education at Waltham High School. However, no specific start or end year is provided for their time at Waltham High School, and no degree or field of study information is available.
